doc.title: Whole Lotta Love
doc.plot: "Whole Lotta Love" crosses three decades to tell the story of William, a man desperate to win the love of young woman at any cost. When Amanda rejects him, he turns to her very best friend for help, but the plan backfires, putting in jeopardy his relationship with the love of his life. The little games he plays soon unravel a warped and twisted triangle of family secrets, love and deception. But when the truth is exposed, things go wrong, deadly wrong.
